name: The Dead Mechanic
description:
The limitation was death had to be a core mechanic, but I decided to make him a car mechanic. Controls are wasd, or arrow keys, space to jump, and you can use the left mouse to pickup the items needed to fix the car. This game is definitely still in development, but feedback is still appreciated

Music by John McKinnon

https://soundcloud.com/john-m-603708856

Coding and Art by Quinn Craven-Pittman

https://escape-pro34.itch.io/
